text: Mourners have gathered in Crans-Montana, Switzerland, to attend a mass for the victims of a recent bar fire that occurred in the area.
The incident has left a significant impact on the community, with many coming together to pay their respects to those affected.
According to verified reports, the mass is being held as a tribute to the victims, with local residents and officials in attendance.
The exact details of the fire are still being investigated, but the community is coming together to support those who have been affected by the tragedy.
